io.janusproject.services.logging

Interface LogService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DependentService, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyLogService, StandardLogService

    public interface LogService
extends DependentService
    This class enables to log information by ensuring that the values of the parameters are not evaluated until the information should be really log, according to the log level.
    Version:
    0.10.0 2019-10-26 19:44:29
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.Listener, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service.State

    • Method Detail

      • createAgentLogger

        default def createAgentLogger(loggingName : String,
                              initialLevel : Level) : Logger 
        Description copied from interface: LogService
        Create a logger for an agent.
        Parameters:
        loggingName - the name to associate to the logger, usually the identifier of the agent.
        initialLevel - the initial logging level.
        Returns:
        the agent logger.
        Since:
        0.7

      • getPlatformLogger

        def getPlatformLogger() : Logger 
        Description copied from interface: LogService
        Replies the logger of the entire platform. The platform logger is the parent logger for the ones associated to the platform kernel and the agents.

        Usually, the platform kernel does not filter the messages according to the level.

        Returns:
        the logger.
        Since:
        0.7
        See Also:
        LogService.getKernelLogger()

      • getKernelLogger

        def getKernelLogger() : Logger 
        Description copied from interface: LogService
        Replies the logger of the kernel.
        Returns:
        the logger.
        Since:
        0.7
        See Also:
        LogService.getPlatformLogger()

      • prepareLogRecord

        def prepareLogRecord(record : LogRecord,
                     loggerName : String,
                     exception : Throwable) : LogRecord 
        Description copied from interface: LogService
        Ensure that the log record has the minimum set of information for a useful logging message.
        Parameters:
        record - the record to prepare.
        loggerName - the name of the logger.
        exception - the cause of the log.
        Returns:
        the record.
        Since:
        0.9
